title: @Riot: I appreciate yâ€™all!
body:
So I’m making this post because I absolutely love League of Legends, and because all of the hard work the teams have been putting into the game as of late is showing.
Swains rework is so well done! The particle effects on the base, Tyrant and Northern Front are just so smooth, and, like Evelynn and Galio, it’s very much appreciated that even the lesser value skins get some new particles that aren’t the same as the base. 
I’m also so, so excited to see the return of VFX updates that don’t come with a full VGU! The new Cho’gath FX are just fantastic, and even though I’ve owned him for the longest time, I’ve never actually played him because I just did not find him visually appealing at all. It’s details like these that give me a renewed interest in playing champions that I wouldn’t have otherwise. I just really appreciate the amount of updates coming to the game. It makes it feel like some champions who have decent kits, but outdated models, and VFX/SFX hope until they’re reworked; if at all necessary!
I’m hoping and praying that this means MF will be getting a slight texture update to her model to make her design fall more in line with the cinematic. I saw the concept art for her ciné-model, and the full bodice, laced up pants that don’t expose her thighs and the jewelry she wears feels so much more like the MF that should be in the game. I mean, she’s more or less bound to be getting a VO overhaul since her current doesn’t match with the new lore MF, and I am praying that with a VO update, her model will be tweaked as well. 
Either way, I am just here to say thank you, so, so much for keeping this game so new, and fresh! 
I’ve been hoping to see the return of smaller aesthetic updates for champions for so long, but read quite some time ago that they likely wouldn’t be making a return due to the fact that there was such little appreciation for them- but I’m here to say thank you! 
It’s lovely, and so are all of you! I appreciate you all very much!
